column4: Can someone help me.  I'm really hungry....I tried 'sudo apt-get Pizza-Hut' but I got an 'Out of Delivery Zone Error'.  I looked in my /etc/pizza.conf but everything looks right to me.
Aww, I was just having some fun :)  My fault.

I've installed mySQL just now; and I've used it in Windows before.  I'm unable to log into it though, I've got a MySQL Administrator GUI (yeah, kind of cheating, I know) but I can't log in because I don't know the correct user/pass
You probably have to SET the root password for it.
